title: For The Flower Road Of My Idol - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Beast Companions   Brotherhood   Caring Protagonist   Celebrities   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Music   Showbiz   Singers   System Administrator   Teamwork   Time Travel   Transmigration
author: 아냐시스
description:
I, who was an idol's fanboy.
Was life the cost of being a successful fan.

When I barely survived, I'm debuting together with 'our kids'?
My breathtaking life, moving between a successful fan and an unlucky fan.
I try my best today again to become a truly successful fan.

'Guys, please wake up!'>
